post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Hi Chilhoan, I hope you are having a great day today!  I am wondering if you can help me.  

I have an opportunity for a Junior Java J2EE Developer.  This role is joining an existing team and we want a recent graduate in order to properly slot the skill set for future growth and career development.  The team already has some 5+ year experienced Developers and this new role is graded lower.
  
The keys are a person with a recent (2005-'09) Computer Science degree, Java J2EE and PL/SQL exp., including JSP, EJB, Struts, Javascript, etc.

Salary range is 50-60K range for fulltime job. Location is North York.
  

Thank you for your consideration.

  

Regards,



Santosh Pande
Staffing Consultant
QUEUE IT Professionals
3100 Steeles Avenue East, Suite 205
Markham , Ontario    Canada    L3R 8T3
T. 905.754.8000 ext 341
F. 905.754.8001

post.title: Junior Java J2EE Developer (50-60k)-North York
